channel.title: Notice board | Unimi
channel.description: General notice board of the University of Milan "La Statale"

item.title: Participate in Our New Research Study!
item.description: Students are invited to take part in a new study conducted by the Department of Food, Environmental, and Nutritional Sciences. The research is part of the ONFOODS project and aims to explore the perceptions and barriers that may influence the consumption of new plant-based foods developed as alternatives to animal-derived products.%0A%0A▶️ Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: Faculty Championship 2025
item.description: To encourage students to participate in the competitions, classes will be suspended on the following dates: %0A• Tuesday, 15 April 2025 ONLY for students of the LITA campus in Segrate (from 11 am onwards)%0A%0A• Wednesday, 21 May 2025 for all students of the Faculty of Medicine (all classes scheduled for the day). %0A%0A
